AssignProject.title: 指定云数据库实例的所属项目

CreateAccountUser.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateAccountUser
<公共请求参数>

{
    "UserName": "xx",
    "InstanceId": "xx",
    "AuthRole": [
        {
            "Mask": 0,
            "NameSpace": "xx"
        }
    ],
    "UserDesc": "xx",
    "MongoUserPassword": "xx",
    "Password": "xx"
}
CreateAccountUser.title: 创建mongodb实例账号

CreateDBInstance.document: 当前示例仅适合4.0版本，其余版本请严格参考传入参数中各版本说明项
CreateDBInstance.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateDBInstance
<公共请求参数>

{
    "VpcId": "vpc-0akbol5v",
    "GoodsNum": "1",
    "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-2",
    "ProjectId": "0",
    "MachineCode": "HIO10G",
    "Period": "1",
    "ClusterType": "REPLSET",
    "Volume": "250",
    "MongoVersion": "MONGO_40_WT",
    "NodeNum": "3",
    "ReplicateSetNum": "1",
    "Memory": "4",
    "SubnetId": "subnet-fyrtjbqw",
    "Password": "pwd123456"
}
CreateDBInstance.title: 创建包年包月的云数据库实例

CreateDBInstanceHour.document: 当前示例仅适合4.0版本，其余版本请严格参考传入参数中各版本说明项

}

<公共请求参数>

}

InquirePriceCreateDBInstances.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: mongodb.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: InquirePriceCreateDBInstances
<公共请求参数>

{
    "GoodsNum": "2",
    "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-4",
    "Memory": "4",
    "Period": "1",
    "ClusterType": "REPLSET",
    "Volume": "100",
    "NodeNum": "3",
    "ReplicateSetNum": "1",
    "MachineCode": "HIO10G",
    "MongoVersion": "MONGO_36_WT"
}
